All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class OscilloscopeGLThread
extends java.lang.Thread

A Thread which manages continuous drawing of a BybGLDrawable onto a OscilloscopeGLSurfaceView

1
Author:
Nathan Dotz

run

public void run()
Initialize GL bits, set up the GL area so that we're lookin at it properly, create a new BybGLDrawable, then commence drawing on it like the dickens.
